About Us

'One more bicycle' was borne out of a passion and love for cycling. Our shared vision has created a space that we hope local cyclists and the community at large will be proud of. Of course we have a first class workshop facility and a store filled with beautiful bikes, but the aim has always been to be much more than just another shop. It's a hub, a place to meet friends, enjoy a mid ride coffee break in our 'lounge' or just pop in for a chat.

Our desire is to make every person that visits us feel welcome and thoroughly appreciated, backed up with careful and considered advice based upon a lifetime of knowledge and experience. A simple principle, but one which is at the heart of everything we do. We look forward to meeting you.
